# monospaced

**Type Property**

The monospace variant of the default typeface.

## Declaration

```swift
static let monospaced: UIFontDescriptor.SystemDesign
```

## Discussion

Using this constant with [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFontDescriptor/withDesign(_:)] returns SF Mono.

## Typeface designs

- **default**: The default typeface for an app’s user interface.
- **rounded**: The rounded variant of the default typeface.
- **serif**: The serif variant of the default typeface.
